item.title: Is RTO Hurting Your Employee Morale? Manager Burnout Could Be to Blame
item.description: If your company’s middle ranks are overstressed, enforcing in-office requirements may not be a priority.

item.title: Hackers Are Using AI to Steal Corporate Secrets and Plant Ransomware
item.description: Turns out hackers are vibe coding, too. And small businesses are paying the price.

item.title: How One CEO Used AI to Scale Himself
item.description: Weber Shandwick’s Jim O’Leary explains how he turned this office into an AI innovation ecosystem in about six months.

item.title: I’m an Amateur Linguist—I Still Couldn’t Guess the Origins of These 4 Words. Can You?
item.description: For Labor Day, here are 4 workplace words. Do you know where they came from?

item.title: Spirit Airlines Files For Bankruptcy Again But Vows to Keep Flying
item.description: The budget airline is considering selling real estate and some of its aircraft.
